title: Lust, Zooming While Ugly, Fabolous Sleep and more.
itunes:title: Lust, Zooming While Ugly, Fabolous Sleep and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  We get something hard from the 70's.  The CLO talks about lust.  Is a signed football from the Superbowl worth $600K?  A 16 year old from Florida gets a lesson in chivalry from Uncle Steve and also finds out what first dates really are.  What makes you un-zoomable?  Are we saying bye to the Bulls?  A prank went wrong today.  Is doing a reality show worth it for you?  This round of Would You Rather is for all that sleep naked and are in a relationship.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about the connection between dreams and education.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
